original_text: and shall lay his hand on the head of the goat and kill it in the place where they kill the burnt offering before the Lord; it is a sin offering.
korean_text: 그 숫염소의 머리에 안수하고 여호와 앞 번제물을 잡는 곳에서 잡을지니 이는 속죄제라

sentences.original_text: and shall lay his hand on the head of the goat
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 염소의 머리 위에 손을 얹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: in the place where they kill the burnt offering
